title: VFX Action Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements!

This package contains 12 VFX Action sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/IbmXgAYQoMI


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 60 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● T_Action_01___512_288_ 7680x4896

● T_Action_02___512_288_ 9728x5760

● T_Action_03___512_288_ 7680x4896

● T_Action_04___512_288_ 9728x5760

● T_Action_05___512_288_ 8704x5184

● T_Action_06___512_288_ 8704x5184

● T_Action_07___512_288_ 9728x6048

● T_Action_08___512_288_ 9128x5760

● T_Action_09___512_288_ 10752x6624

● T_Action_10___512_288_ 8704x5472

● T_Action_11___512_288_ 8192x5184

● T_Action_12___512_288_ 8192x4896


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
